title: Login issue
description: Customer unable to login with correct credentials.

title: Payment not processed
description: Customer reported payment failure during checkout.

title: Feature request: Dark mode
description: Customer requested a dark mode feature for better usability.

title: Bug in mobile app
description: The app crashes on startup in Android version 14.

title: Invoice not received
description: Customer did not receive invoice after purchase.

title: UI alignment issue
description: Dashboard widgets are overlapping in Safari browser.

title: Password reset link expired
description: Password reset link expired immediately after receiving.

title: Subscription plan upgrade failed
description: Customer attempted to upgrade but transaction failed.

title: Report export not generating
description: Export to PDF option is not working for reports.

title: Two-factor authentication issue
description: 2FA code not accepted on login page.

title: Delayed system response
description: Customer reports slow performance on dashboard.
